snippet: As killings rise on the streets of Chicago, the homicides, most of which the authorities described as gang violence, have not been spread evenly across the city.
abstract: Killings are rising in Chicago, but most of homicides, majority of which the authorities describe as gang violence, have taken place on city's South and West Sides; 506 homicides were reported in 2012, up 16 percent from 2011.
lead_paragraph: As killings rise on the streets of Chicago, the homicides, most of which the authorities described as gang violence, have not been spread evenly across the city.

headline.seo: A Soaring Homicide Rate, a Divide in Chicago
headline.main: In a Soaring Homicide Rate, a Divide in Chicago
headline.print_headline: A Soaring Homicide Rate, a Divide in Chicago
